html:
Amazon has a lot of deals on CFexpress Type B memory cards of various sizes and speeds. Prime members get free and expedited shipping as always. Some of these discounts are Prime Exclusive.

CFexpress Type B Options

  • Lexar 512GB Professional Silver SE $119 (Reg $169)
  • ProGrade 512GB CFexpress 4.0 $139 (Reg $199)
  • SanDisk 512GB Extreme PRO $134 (Reg $159)
  • PERGEAR 1TB CFexpress $259 (Reg $399)

There will likely be more memory card discounts and rebates over the new few weeks, but these were the best deals with found currently on Amazon

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
